title: All-Party Parliamentary Health Group
purpose: To provide a cross-party forum that brings together parliamentarians and senior health leaders to discuss key issues on the NHS, health reform and future trends.

contact_details.registered_contact_address: House of Commons, London, SW1A 0AA. Tel: 02072 197116.
contact_details.secretariat: Policy Connect acts as the group's secretariat.http://www.policyconnect.org.uk/

detailed_benefits.Description: Policy Connect is funded by the following to act as the group's secretariat: AAPT, Assura, Autism Centre of Excellence at the University of Cambridge, Becton Dickinson, Bournemouth University, Essex University, Health Innovation Network, IBMS, OrthoDx, Professional Standards Authority, Surrey University, Vertex Pharmaceuticals, Walgreens Boots Alliance From : 15/10/2024 To  : 14/10/2025
